2015.context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. Snapchat dominant with teens. Stories feature success.

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Photo sharing, Facebook-owned, Stories copied from Snapchat later

competitors.name: Facebook Messenger
competitors.notes: Facebook's messaging platform

competitors.name: WhatsApp
competitors.notes: Facebook-owned messaging, 800M+ users

competitors.name: Twitter
competitors.notes: Microblogging and news platform

competitors.name: Vine
competitors.notes: Short-form video (shut down 2017)

competitors.name: Kik
competitors.notes: Messaging app popular with teens

competitors.name: WeChat
competitors.notes: Dominant messaging in China

2017.context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. IPO at $28B valuation. Spectacles launch.

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Launched Stories in 2016, directly copying Snapchat's core feature

competitors.name: Facebook
competitors.notes: Parent company aggressively copying Snap features

competitors.name: WhatsApp Status
competitors.notes: Stories feature added to messaging app

competitors.name: Twitter
competitors.notes: Social platform competing for attention

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Video platform competing for creator content

competitors.name: Musical.ly
competitors.notes: Short-form video app later became TikTok

competitors.name: Messenger Day
competitors.notes: Facebook Messenger's Stories feature

competitors.name: Snow
competitors.notes: Asian camera app with similar features

2020.context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. Spotlight short videos. AR advertising growth.

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Explosive growth in short-form video threatening Snap's youth audience

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Stories and Reels competing directly with Snapchat features

competitors.name: Facebook
competitors.notes: Parent Meta competing across social and AR

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Video platform launching Shorts for short-form content

competitors.name: Twitter
competitors.notes: Launching Fleets (later discontinued)

competitors.name: Pinterest
competitors.notes: Visual discovery platform

competitors.name: iMessage
competitors.notes: Apple messaging competing for teens

competitors.name: WhatsApp
competitors.notes: Global messaging platform

2024.context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. AI features. Snapchat+ subscription growth.

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Dominant short-form video platform among young users

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Reels and Stories compete directly for time and creators

competitors.name: YouTube Shorts
competitors.notes: Google's short-form video competing for creators

competitors.name: BeReal
competitors.notes: Authenticity-focused social app targeting young users

competitors.name: Meta
competitors.notes: AR/VR competition through Ray-Ban Meta glasses

competitors.name: iMessage
competitors.notes: Apple messaging with increasing social features

competitors.name: Discord
competitors.notes: Community platform popular with younger demographics

competitors.name: WhatsApp
competitors.notes: Global messaging with Status feature

2025.context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. Camera and AR platform. Competing with TikTok, Instagram.

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Leading short-form video platform (facing potential US ban)

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Meta's photo/video app with comprehensive features

competitors.name: YouTube Shorts
competitors.notes: Short-form video with creator monetization

competitors.name: Meta
competitors.notes: Ray-Ban Meta glasses competing in AR wearables

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Vision Pro and messaging competing for engagement

competitors.name: BeReal
competitors.notes: Authenticity social app

competitors.name: Discord
competitors.notes: Community messaging platform

competitors.name: Lemon8
competitors.notes: ByteDance lifestyle app

mentionedBy.name: Meta Platforms Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Visual content and AR competitor. Focus on younger demographics similar to Instagram user base. Innovations in augmented reality present competitive challenge.
